resources.string: Smart Tools contains Crypto, VPN, Online Radio, Note, Words and App Manager. Smart Tools is the complete package manager. It has now 6 most trendy apps. More apps are coming. # Super VPN - 100% free fastest VPN to unblock facebook, twitter, youtube and also to secure your mobile. # Live Crypto - Live prices of crypto currencies. # Resume Plus - Build unlimited resumes in a minutes. # Smart Radio - Play online radio with 25000+ stations from all around the worlds. # App Manager - View system and user apps, launch and more. # Keep Notes - Save and track your daily important notes easily. # Learn Words - Learn daily words with pronunciation, translation, synonyms, antonyms and definitions. Solve quiz of synonyms and antonyms from million words.
